function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Regularly update and validate the mobility patterns with real-world data and expert analysis","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of a comprehensive impact mapping framework","category":"Economic stimulus packages / safety nets","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic stimulus packages, social safety nets, and support for vulnerable populations","category":"Economic stimulus packages / safety nets","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase awareness and preparedness for late-stage outbreaks in globalised regions","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strengthen border control measures and screening procedures.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investment in digital literacy and education, equitable access to technology, and cybersecurity measures","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regulation and oversight of data collection and usage","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing strict infection control measures, providing appropriate personal protective equipment ppe , and conducting regular testing and screening for employees.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforcing hygiene protocols, providing ppe, promoting remote work","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of predictive analytics and real-time monitoring to anticipate growth of infection curve and proactively implement measures.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Design bedrooms with appropriate window control for darkness and daylight exposure","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Careful financial planning and cost-effective design strategies to optimize resources","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strengthen ventilation systems, use of personal protective equipment","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing vector control measures, improving access to healthcare, and investing in disease surveillance and monitoring","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Further research and development of alternative infection control measures","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement rigorous health and safety protocols for international collaboration, demande","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transparency in political communication, fact-based reporting","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporating the allocation of essential services into city development planning and zoning regulations","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Robots and drones","category":"Cleaning
